name: ThrowBack (itch)
description:
NOTE: If the web version above acts strangely or is unresponsive, I'm looking into it, but the downloadable versions totally don't have any of those issues. So if you're running into trouble, try the download!!

Updated 12/5/17: Improved performance on all platforms (including web), and small graphical improvements.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a game I made for the #GithubGameOff.

Speaking of which, here's all the source code!
https://github.com/mblissmer/ThrowBack

It has controller support and two player support as well.

Made with all open source or free tools, Godot Engine and Inkscape mostly, with a little bit of GIMP on the side. Enjoy!
